0e5c33f8347bc015.voiceContent: Like picking all your favorite candies out from a huge pile, and building your dream house with them

1184ea93178dbf31.voiceContent: There, there. You're doing great. Have a headpat

1691759ad9e4c619.voiceContent: Just like the Forest Boar that fell in love with a Shroom-Kin. It changed its own form just to ensure the Shroom-Kin's survival

17a98654aa26f3ec.voiceContent: Also, it's much more spacious here than a birdcage

19eae964cdd6c268.voiceContent: Hmm... Well, let's say a Rishboland Tiger ate a fox and got diarrhea

1d33f505fd47c52b.voiceContent: It's peaceful here, like... a leaf floating in the middle of a perfectly still pond..

1e614c0046d5b77a.voiceContent: If Rishboland Tigers stopped eating foxes out of fear of diarrhea, they would have become extinct a long time ago

292282439a7a79ba.voiceContent: ...After a long flight, it still needs a place to land and rest its weary wings

2b848db5a0d33e3b.voiceContent: Sure, but instead of diving into story time, let's talk about what's troubling you

2f6008a773c4b1c0.voiceContent: I know there are definitely good reasons for your behavior. I'm only asking out of curiosity

3884434741a5e8f4.voiceContent: I'm really curious to find out what the first thing you'll do today is

3926a1b41d5489f6.voiceContent: Why don't you take a final trip to the bathroom before bed

3d0a83299b5e3602.voiceContent: Will you indulge my curiosity... and will you accept my request

4717f5410357331f.voiceContent: Sometimes you remind me of a Sumpter Beast, plodding along with a big pack full of materials and supplies

4a62406d4aad3ab1.voiceContent: You should be able to tell from just one look, like when you peer into a crystal-clear lake and you can see all the fish swimming around inside of it

4e99a967adf231cb.voiceContent: I don't feel one way or another about collecting, but since it's something you enjoy, I'd like to join in and see what it's like

55fcbfcd1a86bd44.voiceContent: I'm sure you're wondering how I knew

5726abdec508bb66.voiceContent: You look as miserable as a Lavender Melon that's been struck by lightning

6732647447a4d10a.voiceContent: So what about... making lots of friends, helping them solve their problems, and reading their letters from front to back? Are those habits, too

691853ed3c5259ac.voiceContent: Do you have a new story for me? I'll trade you some Candied Ajilenakh Nuts — I made them myself

73be671eb26d5cb4.voiceContent: Let me be a little firefly taking a rest on that leaf. When night falls, all the stars in the sky will adorn your dreams

73d67df6c7d65543.voiceContent: As long as the Rishboland Tiger keeps eating foxes, and as long as we keep living our lives, we'll experience all kinds of different situations. Fortunate, unfortunate, and everything in between

81fdb43a1e5e4083.voiceContent: As much as a little bird might love exploring the forests and mountains, tasting new and different fruits every day..

8327a04bc8e03ebd.voiceContent: So I'm glad that I can roost here in your nest for a while

8475374a423bd52f.voiceContent: Well, to use an analogy... Let's say a Rishboland Tiger ate a fox and got diarrhea

8871e29df7d725c1.voiceContent: Don't worry, I'm not trying to pry, and I wouldn't let something like that affect what I think of you

8902fa0074cb2084.voiceContent: Um, do you mind if I come in from the chimney, just to take a look

8ed183aa9e822f5f.voiceContent: It'll improve the quality of your sleep. Seems like very helpful advice, so are you gonna take it

94d41ba31d44a898.voiceContent: People do sometimes act irrationally for the sake of pursuing their interests

965275201f9e62cb.voiceContent: I want to travel across this vast land with you, experience everything you enjoy, and do all the things you do

977ba131ca1f1a25.voiceContent: And why do you still collect even more during your travels

aa6ff19475d54f01.voiceContent: Then let's face the sun and pick the first Mint we find

c414f263e0a7e88e.voiceContent: I think the answer to that should be pretty obvious

c53ee6758b29f430.voiceContent: It's very pleasant here. Even the wind brushing against my toes feels soft and gentle. So of course, I love it

c76ad9e7915500c9.voiceContent: You can't know for sure whether the diarrhea was caused by eating the fox or by something inside the fox's stomach. Does that make sense

cd06a11536ae0305.voiceContent: I hope you have sweet dreams tonight

d7f0f9c4d755e6d5.voiceContent: Well, your troubles are written on your face, silly! I'm always observing you, you know

d8e40dd681a8e64f.voiceContent: Don't lose heart. Sometimes you might feel like you're the unluckiest person in the world, but for all you know, it could also just be an unfortunate situation

dc05768ec1547d27.voiceContent: Since you are also driven by emotions, maybe you can understand my thoughts right now

dc8ce75b8ef0d998.voiceContent: #May I start with a question, {NICKNAME}? Do you really enjoy collecting things

dc9655f13e481932.voiceContent: I see, so you've combined all your favorite sights from your travels into one

e560d12e8f652d6b.voiceContent: Today's sunrise is the same splendid color as the breast feathers of a Dusk Bird

e70a4419d82f1e8f.voiceContent: Thank you for being so kind. I know that you mean it, and I'll make the most of my stay here

ec1e966c06f89113.voiceContent: So what about forging weapons, cooking, and making Condensed Resin? They're useful behaviors that benefit you. Is that why they've turned into habits as well

ee06134a7f44b1b6.voiceContent: I'm quite curious. You already have more than enough resources to last a lifetime, so why do you keep bringing everything with you

f551b77129b20502.voiceContent: In the end, they were eaten together as a delicacy... Um, but that's besides the point

ff5f298891ab021f.voiceContent: Mm, yes, I thought so. Okay, that makes sense

00a4df42d39fddc3.voiceContent: Your name is Sorush, right? Would you and your friends ever consider coming to live in Sumeru City

0534cb54810504fd.voiceContent: Hehe, I'm glad you liked it! I told them to stay hidden so no one knew what was coming

0bd2d7dbff6df718.voiceContent: Huh? What's going on here? I thought I just heard my name

0e7c0408b127deba.voiceContent: Oh, Nilou! Did you need something

12d75caae39015dd.voiceContent: I'm sure you probably want to ask what that knowledge was... Please forgive me, for I can't tell you that right now, but I believe you'll discover it one day

1d4c03caefc1cf36.voiceContent: Oh, so it was a conversation about architecture. Hmm... I think innovation can be a good thing

22bb2bfad39524a6.voiceContent: (It seems to have let out a long sigh of relief...

2b2bd620b3f57897.voiceContent: Oh, uh... I just wanted to say, you can always come to me if you ever need guidance or help with anything

392591c0ca899c41.voiceContent: (It seems to be anxious. Let's follow it and see where it leads.

43395b4dc920ae98.voiceContent: He's just in an ordinary dream, so it shouldn't be him

46231d6c98ce61ce.voiceContent: Everyone seems to be having a lot of fun

474d117e43506d70.voiceContent: Not at all! Sometimes, a single moment is all it takes to know you'll remember something for the rest of your life

4b3f6d6e2f7b0260.voiceContent: But... How can we do that

4c10de9fd73867cc.voiceContent: (But first... birthday celebrations, with delicious candy, a beautiful Flower Carriage, and...

4d3acab181ba65ee.voiceContent: (Everyone's been avoiding me lately. They're acting squirrely... like they're hiding something.

5291cd78f17729e6.voiceContent: If we lose control over our consciousness, we will fall into madness... So let's make sure the boat stays on course

584f2ba077305b28.voiceContent: Then let's get through here before the water level rises

5d89da8ec78bed9a.voiceContent: ...Time to head out, dear Knight of Flowers

5e0c41fd714f41fa.voiceContent: (It looks like it's in a good mood, and is waiting for another Fungus.

65b26f228d726ecf.voiceContent: Oh, it's nothing. I was just wondering... if this whole thing might be a dream..

675735ff350ba583.voiceContent: Oh, then I'll head over right away. Thank you for coming all this way, Nilou

68812210df8da3bd.voiceContent: Well, I guess we should head back, Nilou. See you all some other time

6c5073aa0bdb5382.voiceContent: Oh, is this not a good time

7abd1415741e8ed7.voiceContent: (It appears to be encouraging itself. Is it about to face some kind of formidable foe?

7be700271ea08cf1.voiceContent: (It looks really sleepy. Why doesn't it go to sleep?

9cd2458ed9ab0793.voiceContent: (Hmm? There's something strange about this Fungus...

9ed3b95ef8f9923e.voiceContent: I don't have experience with this kind of stuff, but... I trust you

a4788df290354f8f.voiceContent: (I can sense its excitement from seeing its fellow Fungus wake back up.

a935e58672fc166b.voiceContent: Yes, and it appears again as soon as the rain stops. It's less like a flower, and more like a Dendro Slime that's trying to keep out of sight

ab2fad4c529f3ffa.voiceContent: Is that so? If you spend more time among people, you might start to enjoy the commotion, hehe

adc469333d87081f.voiceContent: No, it doesn't seem to be her

b38173f3f24fdfc3.voiceContent: (It's happy because it found some delicious fruit.

c2d5fb81bdc36f49.voiceContent: That's the Boat of Consciousness, which symbolizes reason here. Its course is the direction our consciousness is traveling towards

c59865a0901b804b.voiceContent: Still, I'd be happy to take a look at the plans. I might be able to give some pointers

c90a6b75fff08af1.voiceContent: Yeah! I just know... this will be the most unforgettable birthday I'll ever have

d252e653fb707866.voiceContent: Yes we did, we just fell upwards

d25e2ca9413db9f7.voiceContent: (I have to get to the bottom of this after the Parade!

d9b5e214e6526c81.voiceContent: (They all look extremely uncomfortable... Are they afraid to show me their work? Or embarrassed to talk about the problem?

e013b7ca46772840.voiceContent: (It seems to be anxious and afraid.

e4902f946f50bd3c.voiceContent: We don't have many more festivals to waste. Hurry and find the truth

f47edb557a27a4c7.voiceContent: I believe with all my heart that time will stop for us in this moment

f8ffb21db77e63ce.voiceContent: (It seems to be welcoming us as guests.

f90ec767278ccbe1.voiceContent: So, that's what you meant... A picture! Haha... I never thought about it that way before

fa29a62f62006f70.voiceContent: (It looks like it's very curious about us.

fd030819c0d458ec.voiceContent: It's no trouble! I've had a lot of free time lately. I heard things were getting lively at Port Ormos, so I decided to come take a look

fe281524044eef25.voiceContent: He's just entered the dream recently. It's definitely not him

001d61d2e3cbbd86.voiceContent: Sumeru's desert looks more desolate than the rainforest, but it's also home to an ancient civilization, and supports its own stable ecosystem. One day, when it finally stops arguing with the rainforest, I'm sure that flowers will blossom there, the likes of which I've never seen before

0069eec7b2bc51d4.voiceContent: ...How should I put this? I guess... you wouldn't feed Shroomboars to a Sumpter Beast, would you

06bad691c9bf1663.voiceContent: I'm led to believe that long, long ago, the Seven Archons used to stay in regular contact with each other. I'm a bit of a special case though, so I don't have any memory of that time... Now that things have settled down in Sumeru, I think it's about time I made contact with them again. You're on familiar terms with some of them, right? Would you mind introducing me

0aa21ab6256283b4.voiceContent: Thank you for allowing me to be your companion, and for teaching me so many new things. As the God of Wisdom, I grant to you my blessing From here onward, may your journey be free from confusion that clouds your mind and obstacles that block your path

12507731a9e44a40.voiceContent: He has an almost-perfect grasp of what it truly means for Sumeru to be a Nation of Wisdom. Sadly, the truth as he understands it will never be accepted as the mainstream. Hmm? He's roommates with Alhaitham? Wow... the world really is full of surprises..

13f23caa4140663c.voiceContent: You should go to sleep now. Don't worry, I've made sure there's a sweet dream waiting for you

14f3a78542ec289f.voiceContent: When I heard her story for the first time, her tenacity shone through like a dazzling gemstone. She's been through so much... I hope that just as the rainforest supports all kinds of life, Sumeru will always provide a safe and nurturing environment for her, so that she can grow up healthy and strong

16bbdb22c0d546b4.voiceContent: The sun's setting. It's time to wave goodbye and let the creatures of the night take center stage

18bb3a8ac26736d7.voiceContent: I've been waiting for you for ages

19e5269c6ce934f1.voiceContent: Time to broaden our horizons again

1f399fa4511c0386.voiceContent: Hmm, it seems my train of thought went off the rails somewhere..

2405a868b4537898.voiceContent: Nice to meet you! Hehe, I've actually been watching you for a long time already. My name's Nahida. I might look like a child, but don't be fooled I understand this world much better than any grown-up. So... can we trade knowledge? I want to hear all about your travel stories. So, what would you like to know in return

27099b859a3bbe48.voiceContent: His jokes are like buried treasure gems hidden beneath the surface. They're a lot of fun. Hmm? Well, which part didn't you get? Okay, I can explain it for you

27ef4891651fb34b.voiceContent: The heavens grew eyes to behold the true beauty of the world below, but humans already have eyes to begin with. So, what is it they see when they look at the world not with their eyes, but their vision? You're very smart. Can you figure out what the answer is

2964703ba1fe101c.voiceContent: Being a listener has never been enough for me. I've always dreamed of going out and seeing things for myself. You're such an experienced adventurer... Can you be my guide? I want to experience all your future tales first-hand

2f27756458348b90.voiceContent: I once borrowed someone else's body to ask her if she'd mind allowing Lesser Lord Kusanali to watch her dance... Actually, I had already watched her lots of times before in secret, but I wanted to attend her dance at the Sabzeruz Festival properly, in person, as a sign of respect. Anyway, it turned out that she gently declined the offer... I was a little sad about that

366bb3b6995568a8.voiceContent: Sure! Let's find out which one of us can come up with the better strategy

3a96996ec7cea53f.voiceContent: Did you know that the sound of thunder is the prelude to new life? *sigh* Soon, this land will be brimming with vitality

406fb43a3da4206e.voiceContent: My past is quite monotonous. I could tell you about it, but it wouldn't be long before you let out a great, big yawn, like a Pufferfish taking in a big gulp of water. But curiosity is worth its weight in gold, and I wouldn't want yours to go to waste... I know — let me tell you about all the dreams I've had

427c830454afead8.voiceContent: It looks like my card skills were superior to you this round

4310dcc5a06b734b.voiceContent: Don't bite off more than you can chew

43aab3fa659b841c.voiceContent: Quick, let's find shelter, or mushrooms will start growing on our heads

46b54eb7ecc0d611.voiceContent: The things you've experienced on your journey are so much more exciting than anything I've ever learned. And now, I get to ask you about all of it any time I want, so I can understand each and every little detail... I couldn't ask for more. Alright, let's not waste any more time. Now where were we...

47a928a9e188734c.voiceContent: I hear that playing games is a good way to quickly bring people closer together. I'm sure it must work for gods, too. How about once everyone meets up, I suggest we play hopscotch together? ...Hmm, on second thought, maybe not. If I draw the squares, it would look like I made them really small on purpose just so I could win. That wouldn't be fair on the others

4e6c3af91fbe214a.voiceContent: Umm... does watching you count as a hobby? Because everything you do fascinates me. You're traveling the whole world... Where did you come from, and where will you go next? Who will you meet, and what challenges will you have to overcome? I want to know the answers to all these questions and more. So please don't mind me, I just wanna keep on watching you, all the time

50bec4178375a81a.voiceContent: In my dreams, there can be anything — anything except people coming and going. But since meeting you, it's gradually started to get more lively here... Maybe you're a guide, adding a human touch to my dreams and leading me out from my cage. Hehe, c'mon, let's go. The journey's only just beginning, and I'd like you to carry on leading the way

546b2f9909984562.voiceContent: People often say that wisdom isn't about what you know, but knowing what you can change. It is beyond question that the prophecy was carved into Irminsul long ago... and while it may look like nothing has changed, it also seems like everything has. I think we both know her to be smart enough to turn the fate of the world around

5f401286f64dc525.voiceContent: Time to switch things up a little

64dd28be53f5bd7f.voiceContent: I feel like a Nilotpala Lotus that's been reunited with its leaves, or a Sango Pearl that's found its shell

66db582871465ebf.voiceContent: The Forest Watchers played an essential role in helping the rainforest to withstand the Withering and continue to flourish, and Tighnari is the best of them all. Still... I do hope he learns to be a little gentler with people. Otherwise, it's gonna be difficult for the Forest Rangers to attract new top talent

71fe824133a86911.voiceContent: In my dreams, there's often a flower pot. Every time I water it and add fresh fertilizer, the same flower grows. Can you still enjoy the process of growing flowers when you already know the exact outcome in advance? Hehe, well, for me, I'm glad that at least after the flower has blossomed, it attracts different colored butterflies each time, and sometimes even bees

79a1720ac7b7796c.voiceContent: Very often, only once we get hurt badly are we finally forced to face our own laziness, ignorance, recklessness, or arrogance. There's nothing to regret, though. We have no way of seeing all the possibilities that lie ahead in the future, so we have to rely on clumsy trial-and-error to gain knowledge. Just think of pain as the tuition you have to pay

7a0a6438d6aa249d.voiceContent: The Abyss manifests its power in a manner that is most devastating to the place in question. In Sumeru, it was forbidden knowledge. In Natlan, it was monstrous creatures. Our experience combatting the Abyss is inapplicable to Natlan for that very reason, but I still regret that I was unable to offer aid. Thankfully, the crisis has now been resolved, and Mavuika said many Natlanese are planning to visit Sumeru. I plan to welcome them with open arms

7bd091b271e49343.voiceContent: Can you hear that? The heavens are whispering to all living things, It's time for bed now.

7cf85fbf8f59adcc.voiceContent: What they say is true You have to see the world for yourself to appreciate how beautiful it is

7fa5e85f75ae77d9.voiceContent: I just had a great idea

8913e6c5db2eba73.voiceContent: Oh, the Mare Jivari? A place without anything at all, completely empty — just like a Shroomboar's brain. Of course I know it. ...Hmm? I, uh... It's true, I've never seen it with my own eyes. It's one of the many places beyond my reach

8dd7611aad54ea64.voiceContent: When he finally achieved the ambition he thought he'd been pursuing all along, was he content at last, or only emptier still? We only yearn for the skies because we cannot fly... Hmm, perhaps he should reflect on this once he has held the sheer emptiness of the skies in his grasp

8e715bae7fad339a.voiceContent: If you're not sure what to do next, how about I take you on a walk

9827cca4b0491770.voiceContent: There are still so many places for us to explore

999b4ede55910ad4.voiceContent: Let me put my mind to it

a0de5883802ecf7e.voiceContent: Ah, the weather is lovely and warm. Things are about to start getting lively again

a0f7019c0dbc2f6f.voiceContent: It seems my strategy was more effective this time

a69057cffc7be08d.voiceContent: The gods gave humans barely enough knowledge for them to fill their stomachs. Yet, they used it to craft tools, write books, and build cities, and now they've set their sights on the stars and the abyss... With every moment that goes by, they're creating brand-new knowledge, so I never want to take my eyes off them

a77b8f8cd92df1b3.voiceContent: Definitely Candied Ajilenakh Nuts. I just need one little bite and my brain starts chugging away at top speed, and suddenly there's no problem too difficult for me to solve. The only thing you need to watch out for is Don't put the jar somewhere that's too easy to reach

a91107176e79fe4a.voiceContent: Ah, time for a break. I'd really like a Berry & Mint Burst... If you get one for me, I'll tell you a couple of stories about the sun. Okay

ad0690e9c914915f.voiceContent: Sure. Let's find out who's better at this game

b4a1588e00f2a554.voiceContent: I'll let you take this one

b70dc6c55be3e596.voiceContent: My mind is growing even bigger. It feels like you could fit the entire sky and ocean inside it

bb131c2c4c9d588b.voiceContent: Ah, it all makes sense now..

c23ecfd23123d9cf.voiceContent: Sea creatures are born into infinite darkness and live their lives in the depths of the ocean. It's a complete unknown to me. Eating them is like swallowing an icky storm cloud

c3314048f2a6d85a.voiceContent: Mm, may the world never forget this beautiful flavor. Thank you

c40486ff2b26a83f.voiceContent: I think I'm good at asking the right questions and giving good answers, but I've come to realize that a lot of people just convince themselves they don't understand. The answers to their problems don't help them. It seems to me that as people grow older, they lose the courage to question things and accept the truth..

c439dcfc11500859.voiceContent: Hmm, I'll need some time to figure out where I went wrong here..

c81c4e949c3e54d9.voiceContent: I was thinking, your birthday celebration needs to be at least as grand as the Sabzeruz Festival, so... Hmm? Too much? But everyone's already done preparing for it. C'mon, c'mon, let's go! Just this once — I'll make sure you love it

d07de8f27da55d2e.voiceContent: Good morning. We should get going right away. There are too many things in this world that you'll miss if you don't get there on time

d578bc3b0e4a88c0.voiceContent: Hehe, I really appreciate this. It tastes lovely

d92401128963511c.voiceContent: He holds a body of knowledge more advanced than most could imagine, and his mind is constantly thinking, so maybe nothing in this world could ever fool him. But is the wise man truly wise to view the mediocre majority as defective? Because without them, there is no us

de83aa022d94d873.voiceContent: The first thing she said when she saw me was Nice palace. How much? Of course, I couldn't possibly sell her the Sanctuary of Surasthana. But still, her question had me stumped. I thought about it long and hard, but I still can't figure out how much Mora it's worth..

e651696d82a0268f.voiceContent: Not every General Mahamatra would take such a clear-cut and decisive stance when faced with a conflict between order and justice. He must know only too well that compromise is a path that leads to a dead end, so it's extremely fortunate for all of Sumeru that he's now been able to return to his rightful post

ea25858304c40a7a.voiceContent: She is suffering from exposure to remnants of King Deshret's power. It's as if the great tortoise of time accidentally threw her off its back and left her suspended in the past. If you're interested, you should be able to catch a glimpse of Sumeru from a bygone age through her

ebdbd213783255fe.voiceContent: The wind never blows in the Sanctuary of Surasthana... Oh, sorry. That's probably obvious to you

ebdc79b6b0f6219d.voiceContent: Something on your mind again? Let's work through it together. Two heads are better than one

f041284977084b90.voiceContent: In my dreams, there's often an hourglass. I like to add a few drops of water. Then, I shake it up, and time how long it takes to settle, and see if there's any difference from the last time. There's no reasoning behind it and nothing to gain out of it, but somehow it seems to relieve the exhaustion in my brain. I think that the fact that it's for nothing is what makes it fun for me

f977dc7ca37fd02b.voiceContent: I wonder who this gift could be from

fe5776107b58c563.voiceContent: In my dreams, there's often an empty space. No matter how the scenery changes around it, the emptiness always occupies the most important place. Strange, isn't it? I think there used to be something there, but for all the power I have over dreams, I still can't find the answer as to what it was. Ugh, seems like even in my dreams, there are things that I can't control..
